content: pattern for flower mandala if you love playing with yarn - flower mandala is just right for you it s row are playful and form layers of flowers and cuteness updated pattern version pdf consists of 11 pages including * written instructions us crochet terms * picture for each round and if after reading and trying out you have any additional questions - contact me and i will try to answer you as soon as possible i enjoyed making mandala and writing up the pattern - i hope you will enjoy it too ♥ translations to the original version thanks to anneke de wilde it is available in dutch smile thanks to masako crochet_hmmm it is available in japanese wink video tutorial https //youtu be/cedcbr0dkr4 - fabulous bonus from talented kat @lunacrochetdesigns
